patthana22.24:1.1_0: Naatīto nanahetu dhammo paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.24:1.1_1: Naanāgato nanahetu dhammo paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.24:1.1_2: Naatīto nanahetu ca naanāgato nanahetu ca dhammā paccuppannassa nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana22.24:2.1_0: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe adhipatiyā cha, anantare tīṇi …pe… upanissaye cha …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.24:3.1_0: Naatītārammaṇaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
